title: 3.The Rise of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj
description: The story of a brave and valiant king who fought to protect his kingdom, family, and legacy.

content.text: Since childhood, Sambhaji Maharaj was groomed for greatness. Trained by his father, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, he was prepared to defend the Maratha Empire from any enemy.
Sambhaji Maharaj proved his mettle in battle at a young age. His leadership in the fight against the Mughal forces earned him respect.

question.question: 2.What was Sambhaji Maharaj’s first major battle?

content.text: After the passing of his father, Sambhaji Maharaj ascended the throne. He faced many challenges but remained steadfast in protecting his empire.

question.question: 3.What challenge did Sambhaji Maharaj face after becoming king?

content.text: During the Mughal invasion, Sambhaji Maharaj was captured and tortured. Despite the hardships, he never betrayed his kingdom and remained a true warrior.

question.question: 4.What happened when Sambhaji Maharaj was captured?

content.text: Though the Mughals succeeded in capturing him, Sambhaji Maharaj’s bravery and sacrifice became a symbol of resistance. His death sparked anger across the empire.

question.question: 5.What was the result of Sambhaji Maharaj’s capture?
options: A. His death led to rebellion
B. His capture weakened the Marathas
question.answer: A. His death led to rebellion

content.text: Sambhaji Maharaj’s legacy lives on. He is remembered as a fearless warrior, a noble king, and a true patriot.
